CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 35 On the other hand , Li and co-workers employed the difluoro-substituted thiopheneconjugated side chain to construct bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91 , which was shown to exhibit superior cell performance than that of the Article nonfluorinated control polymer.

Let's think step by step.

1. difluoro-substituted thiophene
2. side chain
3. bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene
4. fluorobenzotriazole
5. J91
6. nonfluorinated control polymer.

These are the Material Name entities identified in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. difluoro-substituted thiophene
2. bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene
3. fluorobenzotriazole
4. J91

These are the Material Name entities that clearly refer to specific materials mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| difluoro-substituted thiophene |
| bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene |
| fluorobenzotriazole |
| J91 |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 35 On the other hand , Li and co-workers employed the difluoro-substituted thiopheneconjugated side chain to construct bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91 , which was shown to exhibit superior cell performance than that of the Article nonfluorinated control polymer.

Let's think step by step.

1. bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91
2. superior cell performance
3. that of the nonfluorinated control polymer.

These are the entities that can be identified as "Property Value" in the given paragraph. The first entity is the name of the copolymer, and the second and third entities represent the superior performance property of the copolymer compared to the nonfluorinated control polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. superior cell performance.

This is the only entity that clearly refers to the value of a material property in the given paragraph. The first entity, "bi(alkyl-difluorothienyl)benzodithiophene-fluorobenzotriazole copolymer J91", is not a property value itself, but rather the name of the material that exhibits the superior cell performance.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
